section.title: Tags Editor
section.para: Tags allow assets to be labelled with any number of tags that you define. These tags can be used to filter assets on the Project Explorer enabling "Tag filtering".

section.title: Creating Tags
section.para: To create tags you simply have to write them on the Tags input and press the "Add new Tag/s" button. The Tag Editor allows creating tags one by one or writing more than one separated with a white space.
Once you created new Tags they will appear over the Editor allowing you to remove them by pressing on them if you want.
